comments.body:
Instead of adding a blank space you use `git ci --amend`, change the commit message, and force push.

Also, there is no re-rendering in staged-recipes :wink: only in the feedstock. Although, rebasing against master is recommended to get latest CI configuration.
ahh, okay. Thanks @ocefpaf! I'll make a note of that.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@
build:
  number: 0 
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
  skip: True  # [py<35]
